mapper.sql: select so.order_id, so.order_num, so.delivery_time, so.order_time, so.clientele_id, so.clientele_num, so.clientele_name, so.category_id, so.personnel_id, so.pay_condition, so.status, so.remark, so.legal_person, so.leader, so.email, so.phone, so.mobilephone, so.abbreviation, so.certificate_num, so.address, so.audit_by, so.audit_time, so.taxrate, so.taxamount,so.create_by, so.create_time, so.update_by, so.update_time ,u.user_num personnel_num,u.nickname personnel_name,d.dept_id,d.dept_num,d.dept_name, so.total_price from sys_order so left join sys_user u on u.user_id = so.personnel_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = u.dept_id /*left join sys_order_sub sos on sos.order_id = so.order_id*/

select so.order_id, so.order_num, so.delivery_time, so.order_time, so.clientele_id, so.clientele_num, so.clientele_name, so.category_id, so.personnel_id, so.pay_condition, so.status, so.remark, so.legal_person, so.leader, so.email, so.phone, so.mobilephone, so.abbreviation, so.certificate_num, so.address, so.taxrate, so.taxamount, so.total_price ,u.user_num personnel_num,u.nickname personnel_name,d.dept_id,d.dept_num,d.dept_name from sys_order so left join sys_user u on u.user_id = so.personnel_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = u.dept_id
mapper.select:
so.order_num like concat(concat('%',#{so.orderNum}),'%')
or so.clientele_num like concat(concat('%',#{so.clienteleNum}),'%')
or so.clientele_name like concat(concat('%',#{so.clienteleNum}),'%')
and so.status=#{so.status}
order by so.order_id desc

select so.order_id, so.order_num, so.delivery_time, so.order_time, so.clientele_id, so.clientele_num, so.clientele_name, so.category_id, so.personnel_id, so.pay_condition, so.legal_person, so.leader, so.email, so.phone, so.mobilephone, so.abbreviation, so.certificate_num, so.address,so.taxrate, so.taxamount from sys_order so
and so.order_num like concat(concat('%',#{so.orderNum}),'%')
or so.clientele_num like concat(concat('%',#{so.clienteleNum}),'%')
or so.clientele_name like concat(concat('%',#{so.clienteleNum}),'%')
and so.status=#{so.status}
group by so.order_id order by so.create_time desc
